html:
12.6.19  8:14 pm   im in ikea as typing this. what do you feel about ikea?

      putting it all in perspective, it really seems like you are the one who should be answering this one

12.6.19  7:53 pm   do you like people

     they're pretty good

12.6.19  7:35 pm   Whats your favorite show right now?

     vfx artists react, by corridor crew

12.6.19  7:24 pm   how do i become a cube

     multiply yourself times yourself times yourself

12.6.19  7:10 pm   Classic Sonic or Modern Sonic?

     FUCKED UP SMALL EYED SONIC, PARAMOUNT FIRST ATTEMPT

12.6.19  6:57 pm   your videos and ideas have me confused and kind of angry, any suggestion?

     stop watching them

12.6.19  6:44 pm   if i asked you to think of a blues lick what would be the first thing that comes to mind

     the steel drum riff from 'weapon of choice'

12.6.19  6:26 pm   hey did you decide you  needed a break?

     no, i decided i needed to become stronger

12.6.19  5:53 pm   Can you make a song?

     i almost didn't even think of that

12.6.19  5:33 pm   what are some good names for pets

     Untitled Pet, and Untitled Pet 2

12.6.19  5:23 pm   which of the stories in your songs more closely relates to your story?

     when i get older

12.6.19  4:59 pm   Are croissants bread boomerangs or are boomerangs wooden croissants

     THEY ARE ALL THE SAME, EVERYTHING IS THE SAME, JUST TASTE IT AND YOU WILL SEE. EAT THE BREAD. IT'S A BOOMERANG, YOU WILL BARF IT BACK UP FOR SURE

12.6.19  4:57 pm   do you ever answer these questions during the day and not a 2:00 in the morning?

     yes, i have done question answering at probably every time of day you could possibly imagine

12.6.19  4:45 pm   i want to be creative and I have ideas but I've never done creative stuff in the past and I'm overwhelmed how do i get started?

     i keep recommending this, and i question if it's good advice because no one else seems to be doing it, but then i realize again how well it has worked for me, over and over again (including now), so i always keep recommending it, and that's to do stuff that's extremely short and ridiculous, just to see if you can get the machine going

12.6.19  4:34 pm   Where do you think goats came from?

Did they fall from outer space?

Or did they grow from the ground?

     they just appeared there

12.6.19  4:33 pm   orange juice with or without pulp

     only pulp

12.6.19  4:18 pm   What is the most useless super power

     dying

12.6.19  3:38 pm   My car just broke down how do I fix it

     i have no idea. mine may break down tomorrow and i don't know how to fix that either

12.6.19  3:36 pm   i'm in high school and i got a b in biology and i feel like my life is over help

     it's actually just the biology class that's over. the entire rest of your life, is actually just starting

12.6.19  3:34 pm   my cat keeps eating my socks help

     give your cat something to drink

12.6.19  3:06 pm   are you excited to pillage the pop charts of 2019

     been pillaging them all year already

12.6.19  3:03 pm   how do i exist? 

     start writing books about different ways to exist and then put them all in the fiction section

12.6.19  2:45 pm   i appreciate everything you've shown me

     do you want to see more

12.6.19  2:24 pm   is music theory necessary?

     you can try to make a music theory, but the music will always escape the theory by way of using evasive maneuvers

12.6.19  2:13 pm   how come my mind isnt a frog i 

     check again, it is

12.6.19  1:59 pm   How do you get a song out of your head? I'm flying today and have been singing "at the airport terminal" on repeat, please help

     very simple, just imagine another song. now that one will be stuck in your head

12.6.19  1:51 pm   how can people be as cool as you? 

     everyone is equally cool. that's just science

12.6.19  1:50 pm   When is the video about velcro 

     every video i make from now on will be about velcro

12.6.19  1:32 pm   i asked a question earlier here but I don't remember which one it was, can you remind me

     sure

12.6.19  1:18 pm   What is wheat

     it's like an explosion of flavor, right on your taste buds

12.6.19  1:11 pm   What are your plans for 2020?

     i can't tell you

12.6.19  1:08 pm   what do you think could be the best waste of time that isn't a waste of life?

     there is almost no answer to that, because if there's no life then no one minds wasted time, but after thinking about it i finally have what i feel is a good answer and it's rocks

12.6.19  1:03 pm   12.5.19  5:52 pm i imagine it would be cool if images (and other items) like this were organised in one place, so that they may all be easily available for viewing, instead of being somewhat hidden in questions. do you plan on doing something like that?

     yes

      (it's just a suggestion, so i'm sorry if you did not like, need, or want it. i'm also sorry if you already had this in mind and it sounds redundant for me to mention. i am also sorry for my question, which is now far too long.)

     you are doing great

      thanks

12.6.19  12:52 pm   what is your favourite 3D structure?

     the earth planet

12.6.19  12:40 pm   My younger brother doesn't understand the complexities of your music. How do I explain to home the intricacies of your many works

     impossible. that would be like explaining the taste of food. or a color. actually now that i think of it, i think i know why it seems like he doesn't understand something. it's probably because you made him listen to something while you were watching. everything goes haywire when you do that. you may not have done that, but i am just guessing based on the sound of your story

12.6.19  11:39 am   How do you react to Chicago-style pizza?

     my hair blew back as the massive slab of pizzaslice hit the plate with a 'whompf'

12.6.19  11:17 am   what's up with the "reality" page on your website?

     thrilling tales from my actual life

12.6.19  11:08 am   Have you ever felt the feeling where you planned to ask someone something, but right when you go to do it, you can't remember what you were going to ask?

     yes

      That's happening to me right now. I'll ask my question later, just letting you know, thanks.

12.6.19  11:04 am   i just did a bad thing

     ah, relatable

12.6.19  11:00 am   bill you were my #3 artist on spotify this year

     now i am curious as to who #1 is

12.6.19  10:50 am   do u ever use ideas for videos that are suggested by your fans (not house fans, people fans)

     no. something i've learned about myself, is that for some reason any time someone suggests something it's almost guaranteed that i will never do it. i am working on this with my therapist, which is difficult of course because i refuse to take any of his suggestions

12.6.19  10:35 am   I have an anxiety problem and get quite existential in a panicky kind of way; I don't know why but just reading your answers sets my brain back right, somehow. maybe your answers are the right amount of comforting and intelligent and random, but it helps. thank you.

     it must be that little bit of crack cocaine i've slipped into each and every one

12.6.19  10:34 am   would the problems of the world be solved if we acted like a smooth rock

     yes!

      or would they increase because rocks can't talk

     oh right, i see what you mean

      you were my 2nd most listened to artist this year, by the way, thanks for making my life better

     i'm curious as to who was #1

12.6.19  10:32 am   Are you a psychopath?

      i am the next best thing

12.6.19  10:29 am   is the countdown timer in a time unit ?

     no

      if so, what's the countdown timer at rn ? if not, same question

     39

12.6.19  10:24 am   will you give me advice on how to punch someone in the face?

     do it with wonder bread

12.6.19  10:01 am   Do you wear shoes? 

     many people have tried

12.6.19  9:50 am   have you got hulu plus?

     i have hulu minus

12.6.19  9:33 am   according to spotify, got to know what's going on is my #5 Song of The Decade. i think i sent in a question this time 2 years ago saying it was my #4 song of that year. anyway, that song is great, makes me feel a lot of emotions. same with when i get older. thanks for the music bill, can't wait to see you break through all the barriers in the 2020s

     i'll see what i can do

12.6.19  9:15 am   12.4.19  12:44 pm is this what people actually mean when they talk about "limb independence" on a musical instrument? that idea confused me for years and i think this way of thinking about that makes a lot more sense

     it's definitely a good strategy. it's like saying "badonk a donk" ..... you are not saying the "a" and "donk"s in separate part of your mind, ... instead you are just putting it together as 1 phrase, that you know. badonk a donk
